title: Accessing the UI on Your Mobile Device
content:
If you happen to get an urgent request to check a campaign while youâ€™re away from your computer, you might wish to pull up app.simpli.fi on your mobile browser. The easiest way to authenticate and access the Simpli.fi UI is through the following steps. [NOTE] This method assumes that you have the Okta Verify Mobile App on your phone. This app is required to access any of your workplace applications on your mobile device. For more information on setting up Okta Verify Mobile App please see these instructions . Instructions Open the Okta Verify app on your phone. Click the Launch Dashboard option just below the covered code boxes. Follow prompts to log into Okta. (Preferably you can use Okta FastPass on your phone, connected to your biometrics). Click the Simpli.fi UI tile and select Open in new tab . Enter your email address. Select the option to Continue with Okta. Use Okta FastPass to confirm it is you. You should then be passed through to the UI. [Image]
